name: the pumpkin hat
sizes_available: baby, toddler, child and adult sizes
notes:
> *this pattern is available for free over on my blog at
> [hanjancrochet.com][1]*

who doesn’t need a pumpkin beanie hat complete with stalk and leaf? it’s an absolute must have whatever age you are. easy to make, the perfect gift and a great little project for post stitch practise. 

recommended yarn: knit picks mighty stitch
hook: 4mm/g
size: baby, toddler, child, adult
difficulty: easy

the pattern is in uk crochet terms and includes a key, material section, us conversion chart, hanjan voucher and notes section.

i am always available to help and love staying in contact with everyone - please share your work with me on www.facebook.com/hanjancrochet or visit www.hanjancrochet.com to find out what i’m up to next!
